```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```
```{r}
#sourcing function from storm_runoff.R
source(here::here("src", "storm_runoff.R"))
```

```{r}

impervious_seq <- seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01)
 runoff_predictions <- predict_runoff(impervious_seq, acres = 182)

print(predict_runoff(impervious = seq(from = 0.6, to = 0.8, by = 0.01), acres = 182))
stormwater_df <- data.frame(impervious_seq, runoff_predictions)
```

```{r}
 stormrunoff_graph<- ggplot(data = stormwater_df, aes(x = impervious_seq, y = runoff_predictions))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_line()+
  labs(title = "Storm Runoff", x = "Impervious surface percentage", y = "Runoff prediction")

ggsave(here::here("figs", "stormrunoff_graph.png"))
```
